title: Advantages of biological control of insect pests

content.description: Biological control methods for managing insect pests are effective for reasons that include which of the following?
content.question: They promote genetic resistance in the target species, resulting in a population explosion of the target species.They generally focus on one target insect to ensure that the target insect population remains low.They can lead to a self-perpetuating population of a control species.

skill.text: Skill 7.C: Describe disadvantages, advantages, or unintended consequences for potential solutions.
